General.Name: Lonkey Industrial Co Ltd Guangzhou
General.Description: Lonkey Industrial Co.,Ltd.Guangzhou engages in the manufacture and sale of cleaning products in China. It offers fabric cleaning care products, including laundry pods and detergents, washing powders, laundry soaps, bleach solutions, collar nets, stain removers, anti-string dyed sheets, and color protection rinse products; kitchen cleaning products, such as dish soaps, dishwasher detergents, and oil cleaning products; and household cleaning products comprising toilet cleaners, washing machine tank cleaners, glass water cleaners, and floor cleaners. The company also provides personal cleaning products, including handwashing fluids, personal and pet shampoos, shower gels, soaps, body lotions, and baby care products; industrial cleaning products, such as carriage and can cleaning agents, all-purpose cleaners, irrigation chemicals, and can film coating agents; and raw materials comprising AES and sulfonic acid. It offers its products under Lonkey, Gofull, Tianli, Wanli, Victory, and Fuan brands. Lonkey Industrial Co.,Ltd.Guangzhou was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.
